q: ''Hopefully, I'll be with the Eagles next year. We'll see what happens,'' said Michael Vick , who added that he expects ''everything to go according to plan.'' We'll see what happens over the next couple months. I just got to be patient and take it day by day, he said. Critics of the war, he writes, accused the Bush administration of lying, compiling a small string of comments- ill-chosen or otherwise deficient- to try to depict the administration as purposefully misrepresenting the intelligence. But, Donald Rumsfeld says: ''While I made a few misstatements- in particular the one mentioned above- they were not common and certainly not characteristic. On Saturday, he wrote, I was met outside by many Egyptians, who asked if the museum was safe and what they could do to help. The people were happy to see an Egyptian official leave his home and come to Tahrir Square without fear; they loved that I came to the museum. ''I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications,'' David Cameron said in a statement. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. Andy Coulson is a trusted aide and his departure is a blow to David Cameron , whose office had long insisted he would stay on despite the scandal. and news conference. WINDSOR, Ontario( AP)- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. ''We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products
